00022 template<typename out_eT, typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
00023 class mtGlue : public Base<out_eT, mtGlue<out_eT, T1, T2, glue_type> >
00024   {
00025   public:
00026   
00027   typedef          out_eT                       elem_type;
00028   typedef typename get_pod_type<out_eT>::result pod_type;
00029   
00030   arma_inline  mtGlue(const T1& in_A, const T2& in_B);
00031   arma_inline  mtGlue(const T1& in_A, const T2& in_B, const u32 in_aux_u32);
00032   arma_inline ~mtGlue();
00033   
00034   const T1& A;       //!< first operand
00035   const T2& B;       //!< second operand
00036   const u32 aux_u32; //!< storage of auxiliary data, u32 format
00037   };
